title: Looking To Make A Team
body:
There are a lot of summoners out there who would agree that solo queue sucks, so I want to get a team started. This way, we can all play to be better and not have to rely on random players in the solo queue. If you are interested, be sure to reply with some info. Here is an example:
-Main role: Jungler
-Suggested Team Name: Chaos of the Void
-Suggested Team Tag: ChaosV
-Highest rank (solo or team): Silver 3
It would be great if you could provide this info. Thank you.
